thread.title: Kinky dominatrix hopes to give Ukip and Tory politicians a right spanking - by becoming a Labour candidate
thread.title_full: Kinky dominatrix hopes to give Ukip and Tory politicians a right spanking - by becoming a Labour candidate

author: mirror
title: Kinky dominatrix hopes to give Ukip and Tory politicians a right spanking - by becoming a Labour candidate
text:
'Mistress Magpie', is planning to enter the corridors of power (Photo: Penny Cross) Share Get politics updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
A professional dominatrix is planning to hang up her whip to enter politics - and fight Nigel Farage and Donald Trump . 
Margaret Corvid, 37, was so horrified about Brexit and the rise of the billionaire President-elect that she decided to swap the bedroom for the council chamber. 
The self-employed sex worker, who trades under the name Mistress Magpie, practises bondage, domination, sadism and masochism. 
But she now has her sights on a different kind of power - and hopes to start a career in public office as a Labour councillor. Professional dominatrix Margaret Corvid wants to enter politics to fight Ukip (Photo: Penny Cross) Dominatrix Margaret Corvid wants to oust Ukip from Plymouth (Photo: Getty) 
She is bidding to be a candidate for the party in the 2018 council elections in Plymouth, Devon, where she wants to oust the Tory-UKIP coalition from her home city. 
She said: "I can be part of the collective fight for democracy, part of the only real answer to Brexit and Trump. 
"The only way to take our council back, I have realised, is do the hard work, to go door-by-door, street-by-street." Read More Professional dominatrix Margaret Corvid (Photo: Plymouth Herald) Some of the many 'props' inside Margaret Corvid home (Photo: Plymouth Herald) 
Margaret, originally from the USA, worked on last year's election campaign which saw Labour lose ground to the Conservatives. 
She added: "I was nervous about my possible reception, but was pleasantly surprised by the warm welcome I experienced. 
"I learned that the core of local Labour activism isn't rooted in the latest news from London. Mistress Magpie want to give Ukip and the Tories a spanking in the local elections (Photo: Plymouth Herald) Professional dominatrix Margaret Corvid wants to stop Donald Trump (Photo: AFP) 
"It's dealing with local issues: a wheelchair-bound woman unable to find parking near home, or the neighborhood infested by rats when the Tory-led council slashed trash pickup in half. 
"We campaign year-round, knocking doors and taking up complaints. Dominatrix or not, if I was willing to get involved, I was welcome." Read More 
She added: "I knew that making a difference in modest, essential ways could lift my heart, connecting me to the humanity that my own mother had once told me I could never join. 
"I couldn't dismantle capitalism, but I could help people by making good policy. Margaret said she was "pleasantly surprised" by the welcome she's had on doorsteps (Photo: Plymouth Herald) Some of the many 'props' inside Margaret Corvid's home (Photo: Plymouth Herald) 
"My husband and I visited a councillor, a sweet, odd, funny friend. We asked if a woman who whips men for a living could ever be elected. Maybe, he said; times are changing. 
"I should note that the process of standing for council involves selection by the local party membership, and that even if I am not selected I will be working hard to help Labour take the council back." Like us on Facebook
